snippet.title: Lost Days 0: Queen's Dream Announcement Teaser
snippet.description: Lost Days 0: Queen's Dream is a Sci-Fi RPG/visual novel for the Sega Saturn about Io, a pilot/spy who was sent to United Europe to investigate Cornelli, meanwhile, the arrival of a skilled assassin threatens her mission.
